TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SqlConnectionColumnEncryptionSetting extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies that Always Encrypted functionality is enabled in a connection. Note that these settings cannot be used to bypass encryption and gain access to plaintext data. For details, see [Always Encrypted (Database Engine)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/mt163865.aspx).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionColumnEncryptionSetting Disabled = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies the connection does not use Always Encrypted. Should be used if no queries sent over the connection access encrypted columns.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionColumnEncryptionSetting Enabled = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Enables Always Encrypted functionality for the connection. Query parameters that correspond to encrypted columns will be transparently encrypted and query results from encrypted columns will be transparently decrypted.
